recipesJson.name: Boysenberry Syrup Crumble (Dinner Lady Blackberry Crumble Plus Remix 1st mix)
recipesJson.author: VaperKitten
recipesJson.description: I LOVE Boysenberry...especially the SMUCKERS Boysenberry Syrup...so when I first bought Dinner Lady's Blackberry Crumble I was in heaven, it taste so much like that Smuckers Syrup to me I can't get enough.  This is my first trial, it is definitely not exact BUT I can tell I am on to something.  Got to get the Crumble down and the Buttery flavor but the fruit is very close with the one FLV Boysenberry.  I will be trying to perfect it over these next few weeks of Quarantine...God Bless Everyone...Love to all...Kim  Still a very good Boysenberry Cream right now but I can make it better.

reviews.text:
Look forward to seeing this progress, are you talking about dinner lady berry tart? Been wanting a recipe for that a long time :D
Going to give this a mix now:)
